questions.question: 4p/(3t) - 9p/(8t). Which of the following expressions is equivalent to the expression above for t ≠ 0?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Subtracting the two fractions results in -p/(24t).

questions.question: 5/(16z) + z/16. Which expression is equivalent to the above sum for z ≠ 0 ?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Addition of the two terms results in (z^2+5)/16

questions.question: (10q/30r+28 - 5q+12/6r+9), Which expression is equivalent to the above difference?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Subtraction of two fractions results in (-18q + 12) / (30r + 18)

questions.question: x-6/9 + 6-x/6 is simplified to which expression for all x ≠ 6?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Subtracting the two terms results in 5/(x-6)

questions.question: x^3/(x-3) + 6/(3-x) is simplified to which expression for all x ≠ 3?
What is equivalent to 5y/12b - 4y/8b for b ≠ 0 ?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Subtracting the two fractions results in y/(48b).

questions.question: 7/(20r) + r/20. Which expression is equivalent to the above sum for r ≠ 0 ?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Adding the two terms results in (r^2+7)/20

questions.question: (12d/36n+33 - 6d+15/9n+14), Which expression is equivalent to the above difference?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Subtraction of two fractions results in (-21d + 15) / (36n + 21)

questions.question: q-8/12 + 8-q/9 is simplified to which expression for all q ≠ 8?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Subtraction of the two terms results in 7/(q-8)

questions.question: q^4/(q-4) + 8/(4-q) is simplified to which expression for all q ≠ 4?
6m/(4a) - 8m/(7a). Which of the following expressions is equivalent to the expression above for a ≠ 0?
questions.whyCorrectAnswer: Subtracting the two fractions results in m/(28a).
